Package io.github.kale_ko.gighm.rendering

Class Renderer

java.lang.Object
io.github.kale_ko.gighm.rendering.Renderer
public class Renderer extends Object
A renderer for rendering scenes to windows
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init() throws AlreadyInitializedException, IncorrectThreadException
      Initialize the renderer (Must be called from a Window)
      Throws:
      AlreadyInitializedException - If the renderer is already initialized
      IncorrectThreadException - If the method is not called from the window
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • render

      public void render() throws NotInitializedException, IncorrectThreadException
      Render the scene to the window (Must be called from a Window)
      Throws:
      NotInitializedException - If the renderer is not initialized
      IncorrectThreadException - If the method is not called from the window
      Since:
      1.0.0
